attributes.action: fine drivers for parking in child and parent bays on supermarkets without child
attributes.additional_details: i am in a supermarket car park with my child in a parent and toddler bay and. otice a lady next to me putting chiloin car and next to her a van pulls away taking he pram with him he doesn’t have a child with him and shouts abuse at her before driving off i want it so if seen parked in a child and parent bay without a child you should be fined
attributes.background: i would like to see drivers parking in a parent and toddler bay in a supermarket without a child fined if seen by staff members getting back into car without a child passenger .
